item.title: Frontier surges as rival Spirits second bankruptcy stokes market share hopes

review.headline_rewrite: Frontier surges as rival Spirits second bankruptcy stokes market share hopes
bullets: The stock was on track for its best day in more than five months, underscoring expectations that the turmoil at Spirit could reshape the
The brokerage also upgraded its rating to "buy" from "hold".

item.title: Rupee trades near record lows against USD, exporters see boon but with caution

review.headline_rewrite: Rupee trades near record lows against USD, exporters see boon but with caution
bullets: New Delhi, Sep 2 (PTI) Indian rupee slipping below the record 88 level against the US dollar will enhance price competitiveness of Indian products
The rupee breached a record low level of 88 against the US dollar on Friday last week and hit an all-time closing low of
The rupee traded near record levels at 88.15 to a dollar on Tuesday as well.
A weaker rupee increases the price realisation of exported products but makes imported products costlier.

item.title: Niva Bupa calls cashless health cover claim denial allegation ‘baseless’

review.headline_rewrite: Niva Bupa calls cashless health cover claim denial allegation ‘baseless’
bullets: A few days after a post on social media on an alleged denial of a ₹61-lakh cashless claim of a patient with a ₹2.40-crore
According to the post on LinkedIn, Niva Bupa Health Insurance denied a ₹61-lakh cashless claim of Chandra Kumar Jain, who has been battling Myeloid
In response, Niva Bupa dismissed the allegations as “baseless”, and called out the “fear-mongering narratives around the case”.
Jain has been our policyholder since November 18, 2021.

item.title: German Foreign Minister inaugurates SAP Experience Centre in Bengaluru
